Articles.Content:
I want to use the RCS module to help control my ship but I do not want it to be a command pod as it seems that the crew will die whenever the RCS impacts.

Is there a way to make a SAS module or any other part of the ship aid in maneuvering like the RCS module does?
Not to my knowledge, but you can do what I did and bump up the crash tolerance of your command pod-RCS module so that it survives staging, so the crew isn't killed.
